"those folks, too, are ending up at digitalalchemy. abandoning all pretext of grammatical structure, people who tried" poll results obama vs. mccain <q> wound up finding news stories about the polls and( a link or two later) an electoral college map with some of the latest numbers. numeric sophisticates are simply searching on <NO_QUOTATION>-- the total number of electoral votes up for grabs.( appropriately enough, that search leads to site entitled: fivethirtyeight.com: electoral projections done right. </q>) many people are keen to know the results in indiana-- far more interesting, it appears than the results in the also contentious state of virginia. indiana election results were this afternoon's hottest google trend.

Mohammed Omar 's message, released at the start of the muslim holiday of eid al-adha, or the" feast of the sacrifice, also rejected any talks with the government of president Hamid Karzai while foreign troops remain in the country. Hamid Karzai on monday, during an eid address, again asked armed militants who are fighting afghan and nato forces to lay down their weapons and join the government. Hamid Karzai last month offered protection for Mohammed Omar - who is wanted by the united states and is blacklisted by the united nations- if he accepts afghanistan's constitution and joins peace talks. Mohammed Omar dismissed that call in his latest message. do not ever presume that in the presence of the occupation forces, the followers of the path of islamic resistance will ever abandon their legitimate struggle merely on your empty and farcical pledges, material privileges and personal immunity
